title: Pakistan Post refutes news item about UPU
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP): Pakistan Post on Friday refuted a news item that appeared in a section of the press regarding Pakistanâ€™s ranking in the Integrated Index of Postal Development (2IPD) report of the Universal Postal Union (UPU).
Pakistan Post in a statement said that it had erroneously been mentioned in the news item that Pakistan had achieved a rank of 155.
In reality, Pakistan has achieved a higher rank of 55th in the UPU ranking, the statement added.
